short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: When using Consul UI, displays a copy-to-clipboard button next to some texts (like IP directions)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Allow displayed IP directions at Consul to be copied to clipboard

Firefox

https://addons.mozilla.org/es/firefox/addon/consul-to-clipboard/
